text: Put Mickelson and Toms out there. You know, they had the morning off. They rested. Knowing them and the competitors that they are, they are probably a little angry that they weren't out there in the morning.
author: Hal Sutton

text: If there was no Black Sabbath, I could still possibly be a morning newspaper delivery boy. No fun.
author: Lars Ulrich

text: They put me on the shift where they thought I could do the least harm, midnight to eight in the morning. Although the hours were lousy, they were perfect for an apprentice reporter.
author: Andrea Mitchell

text: Beauty, sweet love, is like the morning dew, Whose short refresh upon tender green, Cheers for a time, but till the sun doth show And straight is gone, as it had never been.
author: Samuel Daniel

text: I have a family and two cats I get up with my kids early in the morning.
author: Vanna White
